Name: Name
deleteProductAreaWarningMessage: Product Area cannot be deleted due to a system error.
importErrorMessage: Import has failed for one or more preferences.
deleteDefinitionWarning: "{0}" will be deleted from all locations.
noOrgTreeResultsFound: No results found for filter string "{0}".
usageMessage: "{0}" is not a valid filter string.{1}
orgEscapeChars: Filter strings containing quotes must be be preceded with a backslash (\").{0}
prefEscapeChars: Filter strings containing quotes or asterisks must be be preceded with a backslash (\" or \*).{0}
advancedSearchMessage: Filter strings containing colons must be in quotes (" ") unless used to find a specific field value.{0}
orgFilterUsage:
For example, {0}:"Ed Engineer" returns all users for Ed Engineer.
Valid fields are {1}, and {2}.
prefFilterUsage:
For example, {0}:"Live Update" returns all preferences with the name Live Update.
Valid fields are {1}, and {2}.
deletePreferenceDefinitionDesc: Remove all preference instances and the preference definition.
deletePreferenceInstanceDesc: Remove this instance of the preference.
createPreferenceOverrideDesc: Create a new instance of the preference.  If you are an administrator, an instance is created at the location selected in the organization tree.
createProductAreaDesc: Create a product area to organize preferences.
deleteProductAreaDesc: Delete an empty preference product area.
